description:
Lieutenant. Son of the late EW1 hero Gen. Belgen Gunther, and leader of Squad 7.
A twenty-two year old university student before the Imperial invasion, Welkin`s intelligence and determination earned him the commanding position over Gallia`s Squad 7 after he was drafted. His university major, Animal Sociology, gives him an extensive knowledge of Gallia`s native flora and fauna and serves as a basis for his military strategies.
name: Welkin Gunther
